meanings.sent1: She airproofs the windows with tape to keep the cold air out.
meanings.sent2: He airproofs the food containers to prevent them from spoiling.
meanings.sent3: The chef airproofs the cake to ensure it stays fresh for the party.
meanings.sent4: The astronaut airproofs the spacesuit before going on the spacewalk.
meanings.sent5: The handyman airproofs the attic to protect it from dust and pests.

meanings.definition: To seal (something) against the entrance of air.
meanings.sent1: They airproof the doors to keep the warm air inside during winter.
meanings.sent2: The scientist airproofs the laboratory to maintain controlled conditions.
meanings.sent3: The magician airproofs the box to perform an amazing disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The farmer airproofs the silo to preserve the quality of the stored grain.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic airproofs the car engine to prevent air leaks and improve efficiency.
